items.name: Bitter Lake
items.desc:
Bitter lake is our homage to a classic beer style loved the world over that has been fundamental to many of our journeys through beer!
Bitter Lake is a dank, piney west coast pale ale with a classic blend of new & old school hops.
Supported by a malt base that delivers a crisp and clean profile, this stripped back and dry base helps to enhance and deliver a classic west coast hop profile which gracefully fades to a refreshing bitterness

items.name: Land Of Clouds IPA
items.desc: A simple grist of extra pale & wheat gives a soft, pillowy base to a hop schedule of El Dorado, Nelson & Moutere giving aromas rich in white grape, stone fruit, citrus and gooseberry.

items.name: Pale Ale Mixed
items.desc:
A mixed 12 pack with 6 each of our latest, freshest Pale Ales including...
6 x Bitter Lake 5.5% West Coast Pale Ale
6 x Quiet Glow 4.6% Sabro Pale Ale

items.name: Pintle Pale Ale
items.desc:
Pintle is a pale ale brewed with wheat and oats, with an addition of flaked barley in the grist to smooth out the body.
Whirlpooled and dry hopped with Australian Cascade and Citra, its restrained bitterness and dry finish help maintain Pintle's all day crushability

items.name: Quiet Glow Pale Ale
items.desc: Super Pale, torrified wheat & carapils make up the grist for a soft malt character. Whirlpooled with Citra & Chinook then dry hopped with Sabro for coconut & stonefruit flavours.

items.name: Reflections Amarillo
items.desc:
The Reflections series takes a hop variety grown in two different parts of the world and combines them in one beer.
The second in the series showcases Amarillo hops from both the US & Germany, highlighting and celebrating the diversity in taste and aroma that can be achieved from a single varietal grown over two continents.
